Trait.Name: AIDS
Trait.description: She has AIDS, a fatal disease. If you can't track down a cure, she'll likely die. (disease)

Trait.Name: Chlamydia
Trait.description: This nasty disease will cause pain for both her and the customers during urination. (disease)

Trait.Name: Herpes
Trait.description: She has contracted herpes. Customers will not be happy if she gives it to them. (disease)

Trait.Name: Syphilis
Trait.description: This disease can cause death if left untreated. The sores are just the early symptoms. (disease)
